gameDetails.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Queenie 10: Totem Chamber
gameDetails.description:
Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Totem Chamber is an expansion for the Escape base game that includes single game board on which players must activate gems by stacking their dice in the middle of the chamber.

A die can be stacked only if it shows either a golden or black mask. If they stack 5 dice, they activate 1 gem; if they stack 10 dice, they activate 2 gems.
